: : Kup : :

Kup: So you were a mostly Autobot team, sent to protect the Ark, by Optimus, or at least the Optimus of your dimension, and Scourge betrayed you. Hmm. I feel that we should trust each others factions. I'm sure your Autobots and the Maximal forces here could work together.


foxmanroar1@... wrote:
GrimLock looked down. "I... Was King of the Dino-Bots... Prime asked me to be a guardian, and with me my fellows, but the traitor Scourge attacked us, he nearly destroyed the others... He Killed Mirage..., and he placed me in a position where if my young friend here had not rebuilt me in this new form I would have faced a system crash... Scourge had my mind upgraded... and now not only do I know I failed, but he has taken Slag, Sludge, swoop, and snarl."
